verses.verse: Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, My father <S%H1><s%> and my brethren <S%H251><s%>, and their flocks <S%H6629><s%>, and their herds <S%H1241><s%>, and all that they have, are come out <S%H935><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>; and, behold, they are in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen <S%H1657><s%>.
And he took <S%H3947><s%> some <S%H7097><s%> of his brethren <S%H251><s%>, even five <S%H2568><s%> men <S%H582><s%>, and presented <S%H3322><s%> them unto <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>.

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto his brethren <S%H251><s%>, What is your occupation <S%H4639><s%>? And they said <S%H559><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, Thy servants <S%H5650><s%> are shepherds <S%H7462><s%> <S%H6629><s%>, both we, and also our fathers <S%H1><s%>.

They said <S%H559><s%> moreover unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, For to sojourn <S%H1481><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> are we come <S%H935><s%>; for thy servants <S%H5650><s%> have no pasture <S%H4829><s%> for their flocks <S%H6629><s%>; for the famine <S%H7458><s%> is sore <S%H3515><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>: now therefore, we pray thee, let thy servants <S%H5650><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen <S%H1657><s%>.
And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> unto Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thy father <S%H1><s%> and thy brethren <S%H251><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> unto thee:

The land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> is before thee <S%H6440><s%>; in the best <S%H4315><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> make <S%H3427><s%> thy father <S%H1><s%> and brethren <S%H251><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%>; in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen <S%H1657><s%> let them dwell <S%H3427><s%>: and if thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> <S%H3426><s%> any men <S%H582><s%> of activity <S%H2428><s%> among them, then make them <S%H7760><s%> rulers <S%H8269><s%> over my cattle <S%H4735><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> brought in <S%H935><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>, and set him <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>: and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>.
And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, How <S%H4100><s%> old <S%H2416><s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H8141><s%> art thou?

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, The days <S%H3117><s%> of the years <S%H8141><s%> of my pilgrimage <S%H4033><s%> are an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>: few <S%H4592><s%> and evil <S%H7451><s%> have the days <S%H3117><s%> of the years <S%H8141><s%> of my life <S%H2416><s%> been, and have not attained <S%H5381><s%> unto the days <S%H3117><s%> of the years <S%H8141><s%> of the life <S%H2416><s%> of my fathers <S%H1><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of their pilgrimage <S%H4033><s%>.
And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and went out <S%H3318><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>.

¶ And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> placed <S%H3427><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, and gave <S%H5414><s%> them a possession <S%H272><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, in the best <S%H4315><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, in the land <S%H776><s%> of Rameses <S%H7486><s%>, as Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> nourished <S%H3557><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>, and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, and all his father's <S%H1><s%> household <S%H1004><s%>, with bread <S%H3899><s%>, according <S%H6310><s%> to their families <S%H2945><s%>.

¶ And there was no bread <S%H3899><s%> in all the land <S%H776><s%>; for the famine <S%H7458><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> sore <S%H3515><s%>, so that the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and all the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> fainted <S%H3856><s%> by reason <S%H6440><s%> of the famine <S%H7458><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> gathered up <S%H3950><s%> all the money <S%H3701><s%> that was found <S%H4672><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, for the corn <S%H7668><s%> which they bought <S%H7666><s%>: and Joseph <S%H3130><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> into Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>.

And when money <S%H3701><s%> failed <S%H8552><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, all the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> came <S%H935><s%> unto Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Give <S%H3051><s%> us bread <S%H3899><s%>: for why should we die <S%H4191><s%> in thy presence? for the money <S%H3701><s%> faileth <S%H656><s%>.
And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Give <S%H3051><s%> your cattle <S%H4735><s%>; and I will give <S%H5414><s%> you for your cattle <S%H4735><s%>, if money <S%H3701><s%> fail <S%H656><s%>.

And they brought <S%H935><s%> their cattle <S%H4735><s%> unto Joseph <S%H3130><s%>: and Joseph <S%H3130><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them bread <S%H3899><s%> in exchange for horses <S%H5483><s%>, and for the flocks <S%H6629><s%>, and for the cattle <S%H4735><s%> of the herds <S%H1241><s%>, and for the asses <S%H2543><s%>: and he fed <S%H5095><s%> them with bread <S%H3899><s%> for all their cattle <S%H4735><s%> for that year <S%H8141><s%>.

When that year <S%H8141><s%> was ended <S%H8552><s%>, they came <S%H935><s%> unto him the second <S%H8145><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, We will not hide <S%H3582><s%> it from my lord <S%H113><s%>, how that our money <S%H3701><s%> is spent <S%H8552><s%>; my lord <S%H113><s%> also hath <S%H413><s%> our herds <S%H4735><s%> of cattle <S%H929><s%>; there is not ought left <S%H7604><s%> in the sight <S%H6440><s%> of my lord <S%H113><s%>, but our bodies <S%H1472><s%>, and our lands <S%H127><s%>:

Wherefore shall we die <S%H4191><s%> before thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, both we and our land <S%H127><s%>? buy <S%H7069><s%> us and our land <S%H127><s%> for bread <S%H3899><s%>, and we and our land <S%H127><s%> will be servants <S%H5650><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>: and give <S%H5414><s%> us seed <S%H2233><s%>, that we may live <S%H2421><s%>, and not die <S%H4191><s%>, that the land <S%H127><s%> be not desolate <S%H3456><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> bought <S%H7069><s%> all the land <S%H127><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> for Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>; for the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> sold <S%H4376><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his field <S%H7704><s%>, because the famine <S%H7458><s%> prevailed <S%H2388><s%> over them: so the land <S%H776><s%> became Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%>.

And as for the people <S%H5971><s%>, he removed <S%H5674><s%> them to cities <S%H5892><s%> from one end <S%H7097><s%> of the borders <S%H1366><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> even to the other end <S%H7097><s%> thereof.

Only the land <S%H127><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> bought he <S%H7069><s%> not; for the priests <S%H3548><s%> had a portion <S%H2706><s%> assigned them of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and did eat <S%H398><s%> their portion <S%H2706><s%> which Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them: wherefore they sold <S%H4376><s%> not their lands <S%H127><s%>.

Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, Behold, I have bought <S%H7069><s%> <S%H853><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%> and your land <S%H127><s%> for Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>: lo <S%H1887><s%>, here is seed <S%H2233><s%> for you, and ye shall sow <S%H2232><s%> the land <S%H127><s%>.

And it shall come to pass in the increase <S%H8393><s%>, that ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> the fifth <S%H2549><s%> part unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and four <S%H702><s%> parts <S%H3027><s%> shall be your own, for seed <S%H2233><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, and for your food <S%H400><s%>, and for them of your households <S%H1004><s%>, and for food <S%H398><s%> for your little ones <S%H2945><s%>.

And they said <S%H559><s%>, Thou hast saved our lives <S%H2421><s%>: let us find <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of my lord <S%H113><s%>, and we will be Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> servants <S%H5650><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> made <S%H7760><s%> it a law <S%H2706><s%> over the land <S%H127><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>, that Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> should have the fifth <S%H2569><s%> part; except <S%H7535><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> only, which became not Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%>.

¶ And Israel <S%H3478><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, in the country <S%H776><s%> of Goshen <S%H1657><s%>; and they had possessions <S%H270><s%> therein, and grew <S%H6509><s%>, and multiplied <S%H7235><s%> exceedingly <S%H3966><s%>.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> seventeen <S%H6240><s%> <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>: so the whole age <S%H2416><s%> <S%H3117><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> was an hundred <S%H3967><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

And the time <S%H3117><s%> drew nigh <S%H7126><s%> that Israel <S%H3478><s%> must die <S%H4191><s%>: and he called <S%H7121><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, If now I have found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in thy sight <S%H5869><s%>, put <S%H7760><s%>, I pray thee, thy hand <S%H3027><s%> under my thigh <S%H3409><s%>, and deal <S%H6213><s%> kindly <S%H2617><s%> and truly <S%H571><s%> with me; bury <S%H6912><s%> me not, I pray thee, in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>:

But I will lie <S%H7901><s%> with my fathers <S%H1><s%>, and thou shalt carry <S%H5375><s%> me out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and bury <S%H6912><s%> me in their buryingplace <S%H6900><s%>. And he said <S%H559><s%>, I will do <S%H6213><s%> as thou hast said <S%H1697><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%>, Swear <S%H7650><s%> unto me. And he sware <S%H7650><s%> unto him. And Israel <S%H3478><s%> bowed <S%H7812><s%> himself upon the bed's <S%H4296><s%> head <S%H7218><s%>.
